moves.1... d5: I don't know how to play the opening, so i played with tempo.
moves.2. Bg2: Leaving the pawn unprotected, but with a rick up his sleeves.
moves.2... Bxg4: Taking and not knowing the trick.
moves.3... e6: Defending but sadly, my position started getting worse.
moves.4. Qb3: He just keeps on attacking me!
moves.4... Qc8: My only defence with a good purpose.
moves.5. cxd5: If i take the pawn, it  would be terrible.
moves.5... c6: So i decided that if he takes the c pawn, i would develop my knight with tempo, if he takes the e pawn, i would attack the queen with Bxe6.
moves.6... cxd5: Now i'm winning! I'm going to win a pawn or mate on c1
moves.7. exd5: And he esinged because i will put mate on c1 now.
